description:
doc/install: document minimum system requirements
        Partly copied from CL 5685076.

messages.text: I'm not sure about the placement and wording of this. I will take a look at it once I'm done with the go1.0.1 push. Thanks.
O_CLOEXEC is introduced in 2.6.23, so I guess it is the minimum requirement for Linux kernel, correct me if I'm wrong.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

From http://code.google.com/p/go/issues/detail?id=2132 it's clear that we only support gcc that comes with Xcode on Mac OS X.

Also included the mingw gcc requirement on Windows.

http://codereview.appspot.com/6112064/diff/5/doc/install.html File doc/install.html (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/6112064/diff/5/doc/install.html#newcode29 doc/install.html:29: Please make sure your system meet these OS and architecture requirements before s/meet/meets/ http://codereview.appspot.com/6112064/diff/5/doc/install.html#newcode30 doc/install.html:30: proceeding. If your OS or architecture is not on the list, chances are that s/chances are/it's possible/ http://codereview.appspot.com/6112064/diff/5/doc/install.html#newcode31 doc/install.html:31: gccgo might support your OS/architecture, please see s;OS/architecture;setup; s/, please/;/ http://codereview.appspot.com/6112064/diff/5/doc/install.html#newcode49 doc/install.html:49: Also note that we only require gcc if you plan to use cgo. Gcc is required only if you plan to use cgo.

http://codereview.appspot.com/6112064/diff/16001/doc/install.html File doc/install.html (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/6112064/diff/16001/doc/install.html#newcode44 doc/install.html:44: Mac OS X 10.6/10.7 amd64, 386 Please use the gcc that comes with Xcode s/Please // gcc* http://codereview.appspot.com/6112064/diff/16001/doc/install.html#newcode45 doc/install.html:45: Windows 2000 or later amd64, 386 mingw gcc is required, cygwin or msys is not gcc* http://codereview.appspot.com/6112064/diff/16001/doc/install.html#newcode49 doc/install.html:49: Gcc is required only if you plan to use cgo. * Gcc is required...

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, adg@golang.org, r@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

PTAL.

Also added the note that we don't provide binary distribution for ARM yet.
looks good to me, but please wait for adg to sign off.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=46a117d22ce2 ***

doc/install: document minimum system requirements
        Partly copied from CL 5685076.

R=golang-dev, adg, r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6112064

Committer: Andrew Gerrand <adg@golang.org>

subject: code review 6112064: doc/install: document minimum system requirements
